prompts:
help me i ahve restarted claude > /mcp 
  ⎿ No MCP servers configured. Please run /doctor if this is unexpected. 
    Otherwise, run `claude mcp` or visit 
    https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/mcp to learn more.

> claude mcp 

⏺ I see you're looking at MCP (Model Context Protocol) configuration. The
  /mcp command shows no servers are currently active, but I notice there's
  an untracked .mcp.json file in the project. Let me check what's in it:

⏺ Read(.mcp.json)
  ⎿  Read 29 lines

⏺ You have an .mcp.json file configured with 3 MCP servers:

  | Server         | Purpose                   |
  |----------------|---------------------------|
  | firecrawl-mcp  | Web scraping/crawling     |
  | perplexity-ask | Perplexity AI search      |
  | omnifocus      | OmniFocus task management |

  However, Claude Code isn't detecting them. A few things to check:

  1. File location: The .mcp.json is in /Users/donovan/PROMAN_OS/COO/.
  Claude Code looks for MCP config in:
    - Project root (.mcp.json)
    - User home (~/.claude/mcp.json or ~/.claude/.mcp.json)
  2. Restart needed: After adding MCP config, you typically need to restart
   Claude Code for it to pick up the servers.

  Quick options:

  - Run /doctor to diagnose configuration issues
  - Restart Claude Code (Ctrl+C then claude again) to reload MCP servers
  - Move config to home if you want these servers available globally:
  ~/.claude/.mcp.json

  Would you like me to help troubleshoot or move the configuration?

> /doctor 
  ⎿  Claude Code diagnostics dismissed

> /doctor 
  ⎿  Claude Code diagnostics dismissed ultrathink
can we delete the   ~/.claude/mcp.json. to prevent any issue later on dowm the line
